subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andre Iguodala scored 19 of his 28 points in the second half, Samuel Dalembert had 11 points, 18 rebounds and 5 blocks, and the Philadelphia 76ers rallied for a 91-87 victory over the visiting Nets on Saturday night.
snippet: Andre Iguodala scored 19 of his 28 points in the second half, Samuel Dalembert had 11 points, 18 rebounds and 5 blocks, and the Philadelphia 76ers rallied for a 91-87 victory over the visiting Nets on Saturday night.
